short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically generate SAT questions in BlueKey Prep's Digital SAT platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PrepGPT uses Large Language Models that have been meticulously fine-tuned to provide Digital SAT exam questions that are indistinguishable from the official practice sets. It is available for use on BlueKey Prep's DSAT platform.
